from sys import stdout
t = int(raw_input())
while t>0:
    n = int(raw_input())
    a = map(int,raw_input().split())
    a.sort()
    for i in xrange(len(a)-1):
        if i%2==0:
            if a[i] > a[i+1]:
                a[i],a[i+1] = a[i+1],a[i]
        else:
            if a[i] < a[i+1]:
                a[i],a[i+1] = a[i+1],a[i]
    for i in range(len(a)):
        stdout.write(str(a[i])+" ")
    stdout.write("\n")
    t-=1
